page.title: 04APPLEBY VILLAGE CONTINUED
page.content: Recently there have been suggestions that Appleby may be affected by boundary changes and moved into {Warwickshire.}Most villagers do not want this to happen.In addition there have been plans put forward to{develop 9 acres of land in the middle of the village for{housing.}Again this is not popular.However it seems that the local council will allow a smaller development of 50 houses on the western end of the village. One problem facing the village is that a large proportion of the village are{elderly}(109 over the age of 70 while only 72 of primary school age) and they find{transport}a difficulty. They do not like using buses(4 on a weekday)and those over 70 do not like driving cars.Many of these people retired to Appleby from Birmingham and have no family locally to help.
